channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Retain Live Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Retain Live Chat

item.title: CVE-2022-3391|2024-08-03T01:07:06.531Z -- unknown -- retain%20live%20chat
item.description: The Retain Live Chat WordPress plugin through 0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
